question: Which state government has launched Mukhya Mantri Seva Sankalp Helpline 1100?
explanation: The Himachal Pradesh government has launched Mukhya Â Mantri Seva Sankalp Helpline 1100 for speedy and time-bound redressal of public grievances. The helpline will function 6 days a week (Monday-Saturday) from 7 am to 10 pm.
